attributes.action: Force a General Election for 2022 due Partygate and Law-breaking
attributes.additional_details: This conservative government have been found to be repeatadly breaking the law. Members of parliament including the prime minister, have been reported & fined due to be taking part in illegal lockdown parties. Families could not even attend the funerals of their loved ones, fathers and mothers died with nobody to hold their hand. This government has broken the very laws that they enacted, and have acted with contempt towards the great people of this country. There must be a public decision.
attributes.background: As the current government have been involved in numerous scandals, the amount of damage done to the reputation and faith in our democracy hangs on a delicate thread. The UK parliament MUST enact a general election to allow the public to decide whether they still want these individuals in power.

rejection.details: Call for an early General Election for 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
